item.title: BL-15/BL-84/UT-15 North Approaching UT-38
item.description: BL-15/BL-84/UT-15 North (Main St.) approaching UT-38 in Brigham City. Merge left to continue north on UT-13 and for I-84 and I-15.

item.title: End US-91 North at US-26/BL-15
item.description: Northern end of US-91 north at US-26 and BL-15. US-91 was recently extended, when US-26 was rerouted to the new Exit 116 interchange on I-15.

item.title: US-91 North at US-89/UT-13/BL-15/BL-84
item.description: US-91 north at US-89/UT-13/BL-15/BL-84. US-89 joins US-91 north to Logan.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 330
item.description: I-15 North at Exit 330 - BL-15/To UT-126/Layton.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 222
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 222 - BL-15/UT-28/S. Main St.
